title: Agbe
author: Agbe
content: Roqqu wey bi cryptocurrency exchange platform in 9ja e don get license 4rom Europe 2 expand it Operation 2 28 kwantri in di world Europe). In the adoption of bitcoin or other Cryptocurrencies in the kwantri, things must be done in a rigorous way, and thes are some of the things need to done. For a kwantri 2 adopt bitcoin, at least let there be Cryptocurrencies exchange platforms, so that things go dey easy for us because p2p sometimes e no dey easy 2 get mostly wen won need cash in di nite. I thank Roqqu 4 dia effort expand dia service 2 other kwantries. Nigerian Crypto Exchange Roqqu Gets European Union Virtual Currency License

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on January 04, 2023, 03:04:29 PMat least let there be Cryptocurrencies exchange platforms, so that things go dey easy for us because p2p sometimes e no dey easy 2 get mostly wen won need cash in di nite.This article is a paid article and I guess Roqqu exchange will be the one that paid for it: Roqqu launches it’s seamless P2P system amidst uproar in cryptocurrency.According to the article, Roqqu is a peer-to-peer exchange. But I was surprised that the exchange is demanding for name and mobile number while registering, or to register using Google or Facebook.I tried to find out how their p2p works but I was unable to do that to satisfaction, I will appreciate if anyone among us can let us know about that

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Roqqu wallet wey be closed source na im we dey reason the matta here like sey na something wey dey good? Abeg! My experience once wit Roqqu nor be betta one at all. Make I share d experience with una. I do P2P with one dude wey dey use Roqqu wallet. I send d cash and d cash was moved out less than 5 mins afta d Bitcoin enta dat wallet. The buyer begin tell me sey im nor see d cash. Like play like play, d thing enter argument between me and the guy wey I sell am give to the point of person wey do escrow for us come shook mouth put. I went back and checked my transaction ID and then trace everything there before I come get how the cash take enta and come leave. I accused d buyer, he denied it. Escrow asked him to mail Roqqu customer care. Na so we got d thing resolved oh. D issue was from Roqqu. Na dem remove d cash with one reason wey dem give wey I nor fit remember again sef. The more than 48hrs stress wey dat thing cause me nor dey funny at all. I think d cash involved then was around $250 sef.

Same here I had a bad experience using Roqqu, it was in the early days and I wanted to buy bitcoins from the app. The whole process was tiring. I don’t know if they have improved their service now because I stopped using after this experience. To buy bitcoins back then, you had to deposit into your roqqu wallet, they charge I think 50naira for that. So now I’m short a lil cash and I don’t mind, I place a buy order and the money is deducted but I don’t receive any coins, after 2 hrs I message support. No response (this was on a weekend, I later found out they didn’t work on weekends just like the banks) and had to wait till Monday before it was resolved. I moved my coins to another wallet, and the transfer fee was just too much. I was pissed. I moved everything from the wallet and never opened the app again. I wouldn’t advice anyone to use their service.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Not to criticize the app but they nearly chased me away from cryptocurrency. I remember doing a transaction that I wanted to receive my money to my local bank (first bank to be certain) but they told me the payment option wasn’t available that I should use Wallets like Opay, Kuda and the rest after choosing both Kuda and Opay I wasn’t still able to withdraw. The only payment option as at then was Raven, something I didn’t had that time I tried opening Raven account but there KYC was taking too long and I had to use a friends Raven account. When I asked around from people already more experienced in crypto as at then they warned me about there support and I should never use them again
